item.title: What To Use Instead of PGP - Dhole Moments
item.description: It's been more than five years since The PGP Problem was published, and I still hear from people who believe that using PGP (whether GnuPG or another OpenPGP implementation) is a thing they should be doing. It isn't. I don't blame individual Internet users for this confusion. There is a lot of cargo-culting around communicationâ€¦
